## Software

You will need the following software:

-   [Download and install R](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/).
-   [Download and install RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/).
-   [Download and install Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/download/).

## Preparation

In order to teach this lesson, you will need to be familiar with: - [ORCiD]() - [The Turing Way: Guide for Reproducible Research](https://the-turing-way.netlify.app/reproducible-research/reproducible-research.html) - [Quarto](https://quarto.org)

## Files

The `README.md` file contains a list of the files in the repository. To update the presentation, modify the `AuthorCarpentry.qmd` file and click **Render** to produce the HTML formatted presentation.
